description: PM Modi reviews drought & water scarcity situation with Odisha CM Naveen Patnaik Odisha completes District Irrigation Plans for all 30 districts required under Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchai Yojan
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Extensive deliberations with CM Naveen Patnaik on drought situation in Odisha & ways to mitigate it.

CM Patnaik spoke on Odisha completing District Irrigation Plans for all 30 districts, as required under PM Krishi Sinchai Yojana. Progress in other agriculture schemes, piped water supply, and banking extension facilities in rural areas of Odisha were also discussed. http://www.narendramodi.in/pm-reviews-drought-and-water-scarcity-situation-at-high-level-meeting-with-odisha-cm-453283
